AbsorbingMan.name: Absorbing Man
AbsorbingMan.description: On Reveal: If the last card you played has an On Reveal, copy its text. (if it's in play)

AdamWarlock.name: Adam Warlock
AdamWarlock.description: At the end of each turn, if you are winning this location, draw a card.

Aero.name: Aero
Aero.description: On Reveal: Move the last enemy card played this turn to this location.

AgathaHarkness.name: Agatha Harkness
AgathaHarkness.description: Agatha starts in your hand and plays your cards for you.

Agent13.name: Agent 13
Agent13.description: On Reveal: Add a random card to your hand.

AgentCoulson.name: Agent Coulson
AgentCoulson.description: On Reveal: Add a random 4-Cost and 5-Cost card to your hand.

AmericaChavez.name: America Chavez
AmericaChavez.description: Starts on the bottom of your deck. Draw this on turn 6.

Angel.name: Angel
Angel.description: When one of your cards is destroyed, this flies out of your deck to replace it.

Angela.name: Angela
Angela.description:
After you play a card here,
+2 Power.

AntMan.name: Ant Man
AntMan.description: Ongoing: If you have 3 other cards here, +3 Power.

Apocalypse.name: Apocalypse
Apocalypse.description: When you discard this from your hand, put it back with +4 Power.

Armor.name: Armor
Armor.description: Ongoing: Cards at this location can't be destroyed.

ArnimZola.name: Arnim Zola
ArnimZola.description: On Reveal: Destroy a random friendly card here. Add copies of it to the other locations.

BaronMordo.name: Baron Mordo
BaronMordo.description: On Reveal: Your opponent draws a card. Set its Cost to 6.

Beast.name: Beast
Beast.description: On Reveal: Return your other cards at this location to your hand. They cost 1 less.

Bishop.name: Bishop
Bishop.description: After you play a card, this gains +1 Power.

BlackBolt.name: Black Bolt
BlackBolt.description: On Reveal: Discard the lowest-cost card from your opponent's hand.

BlackCat.name: Black Cat
BlackCat.description: If you end the turn with this in your hand, discard it.

BlackKnight.name: Black Knight
BlackKnight.description: When this is destroyed, draw a card.

BlackWidow.name: Black Widow
BlackWidow.description: On Reveal: Add a Widow's Bite to your opponent's hand.

Blade.name: Blade
Blade.description: On Reveal: Discard a card from your hand.

Blink.name: Blink
Blink.description: You can move this each turn. When it moves, +1 Power.

Blob.name: Blob
Blob.description: Ongoing: Nothing can move this to another location.

Brood.name: Brood
Brood.description: On Reveal: Add 2 Broodlings to this location with the same Power.

Broodling.name: Broodling
Broodling.description: "We are Brood, from Broodworld. You are lunch."

BuckyBarnes.name: Bucky Barnes
BuckyBarnes.description: When this is destroyed, replace it with the Winter Soldier.

Bullseye.name: Bullseye
Bullseye.description: On Reveal: The next card you draw will be a 2-Cost card. (if any are left)

Cable.name: Cable
Cable.description: On Reveal: Draw the top card of your opponent's deck.

CaptainAmerica.name: Captain America
CaptainAmerica.description: Ongoing: Your other cards at this location have +1 Power.

CaptainMarvel.name: Captain Marvel
CaptainMarvel.description:
At the end of the game, move to a location that wins you the
game. (If possible)

Carnage.name: Carnage
Carnage.description: On Reveal: Destroy your other cards here. +2 Power for each destroyed.

Cloak.name: Cloak
Cloak.description: On Reveal: Next turn, both players can move cards to this location.

ColleenWing.name: Colleen Wing
ColleenWing.description: On Reveal: Discard the lowest-cost card from your hand.

Colossus.name: Colossus
Colossus.description: Ongoing: Can't be destroyed, moved, or have its Power reduced.

Cosmo.name: Cosmo
Cosmo.description: Ongoing: On Reveal abilities won't happen at this location.

Crossbones.name: Crossbones
Crossbones.description: You can only play this at locations where you are winning.

Crystal.name: Crystal
Crystal.description: On Reveal: Each player draws a card.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description:
When this moves to a location,
+2 Power for each card your
opponent has there.

Daredevil.name: Daredevil
Daredevil.description:
On turn 5, you get to see your opponent's plays before you
make your own.

Darkhawk.name: Darkhawk
Darkhawk.description: Ongoing: +2 Power for each card in your opponent's deck.

Dazzler.name: Dazzler
Dazzler.description: Ongoing: +2 Power for each location that's full on your side.

Deadpool.name: Deadpool
Deadpool.description: When this is destroyed, return it to your hand with double the Power.

Death.name: Death
Death.description: Costs 1 less for each card destroyed this game.

Deathlok.name: Deathlok
Deathlok.description: On Reveal: Destroy your other cards at this location.

Debrii.name: Debrii
Debrii.description: On Reveal: Add a Rock to each other location, for both players.

DevilDinosaur.name: Devil Dinosaur
DevilDinosaur.description: Ongoing: +2 Power for each card in your hand.

DoctorOctopus.name: Doctor Octopus
DoctorOctopus.description: On Reveal: Pull 4 random cards from your opponent's hand to their side of this location.

DoctorStrange.name: Doctor Strange
DoctorStrange.description: On Reveal: Move your highest-Power card(s) to this location.

Domino.name: Domino
Domino.description: You always draw this card on turn 2, and not before.

Dracula.name: Dracula
Dracula.description: At the end of the game, discard a card from your hand. This has its Power.

Drax.name: Drax
Drax.description: On Reveal: If your opponent played a card here this turn, +2 Power.

DrDoom.name: Doctor Doom
DrDoom.description: On Reveal: Add a 4-Power DoomBot to each other location.

EbonyMaw.name: Ebony Maw
EbonyMaw.description: You can't play this after turn 3. Ongoing: You can't play cards here.

Electro.name: Electro
Electro.description: On Reveal: +1 Max Energy. Ongoing: You can only play 1 card a turn.

Elektra.name: Elektra
Elektra.description: On Reveal: Destroy a random enemy 1-Cost card at this location.

ElektraTutorial.name: Elektra
ElektraTutorial.description: "To look upon me is to see the end."

ElsaBloodstone.name: Elsa Bloodstone
ElsaBloodstone.description: At the end of each turn, if you are winning this location, +1 Power.

Enchantress.name: Enchantress
Enchantress.description: On Reveal: Remove the abilities from all Ongoing cards at this location.

Falcon.name: Falcon
Falcon.description: On Reveal: Return your 1-Cost cards to your hand.

Forge.name: Forge
Forge.description: On Reveal: Give the next card you play +3 Power.

Galactus.name: Galactus
Galactus.description: On Reveal: If you're winning this location and this is your only card here, destroy all other locations.

Gambit.name: Gambit
Gambit.description: On Reveal: Discard a card from your hand. Destroy a random enemy card.

Gamora.name: Gamora
Gamora.description: On Reveal: If your opponent played a card here this turn, +5 Power.

GhostRider.name: Ghost Rider
GhostRider.description: On Reveal: Bring back one of your discarded cards to this location.

GhostSpider.name: Ghost-Spider
GhostSpider.description: On Reveal: The last card you played moves here.

Giganto.name: Giganto
Giganto.description: You can only play this at the left location.

GoblinQueen.name: Goblin Queen
GoblinQueen.description: On Reveal: Other cards can't be revealed this turn.

Goose.name: Goose
Goose.description: Ongoing: Nobody can play cards that cost 4, 5, or 6 at this location.

GreenGoblin.name: Green Goblin
GreenGoblin.description: On Reveal: Your opponent gains control of this.

Groot.name: Groot
Groot.description: On Reveal: If your opponent played a card here this turn, +2 Power.

Hawkeye.name: Hawkeye
Hawkeye.description: On Reveal: If you play a card here next turn, +3 Power.

Hazmat.name: Hazmat
Hazmat.description: On Reveal: Afflict all other cards with -1 Power.

Heimdall.name: Heimdall
Heimdall.description: On Reveal: Move your other cards one location to the left.

Hela.name: Hela
Hela.description: On Reveal: Resurrect all cards you discarded from your hand to random locations.

Helicarrier.name: Helicarrier
Helicarrier.description:
When you discard this from your hand, add 3 random cards
to your hand.

Hellcow.name: Hellcow
Hellcow.description: On Reveal: Discard 2 cards from your hand.

HitMonkey.name: Hit-Monkey
HitMonkey.description: On Reveal: Gain +2 Power for each other card you played this turn.

Hobgoblin.name: Hobgoblin
Hobgoblin.description: On Reveal: Your opponent gains control of this.

Hood.name: The Hood
Hood.description: On Reveal: Add a Demon to your hand.

Hulkbuster.name: Hulkbuster
Hulkbuster.description: On Reveal: Merge this card with a random friendly card at this location.

HumanTorch.name: Human Torch
HumanTorch.description:
When this moves, double
its Power.

Iceman.name: Iceman
Iceman.description: On Reveal: Give a random card in your opponent's hand +1 Cost. (maximum 6)

Infinaut.name: The Infinaut
Infinaut.description: If you played a card last turn, you can't play this.

InvisibleWoman.name: Invisible Woman
InvisibleWoman.description: Ongoing: Cards you play here are not revealed until the game ends.

IronFist.name: Iron Fist
IronFist.description: On Reveal: After you play your next card, move it one location to the left.

Ironheart.name: Ironheart
Ironheart.description: On Reveal: Give 3 other friendly cards +2 Power.

IronMan.name: Iron Man
IronMan.description: Ongoing: Your total Power is doubled at this location.

JaneFoster.name: Jane Foster Mighty Thor
JaneFoster.description: On Reveal: Draw all cards that Cost 0 from your deck.

JeanGrey.name: Jean Grey
JeanGrey.description: Ongoing: Players must play their first card here each turn. (if possible)

JeffTheBabyLandShark.name: Jeff the Baby Land Shark
JeffTheBabyLandShark.description: You can move this once. Nothing can stop you from moving or playing this to any location.

JessicaJones.name: Jessica Jones
JessicaJones.description: On Reveal: If you don't play a card here next turn, +4 Power.

Jubilee.name: Jubilee
Jubilee.description: On Reveal: Add the top card of your deck to this location.

Juggernaut.name: Juggernaut
Juggernaut.description: On Reveal: If your opponent played cards here this turn, move them randomly.

Kang.name: Kang
Kang.description: On Reveal: Look at what your opponent did, then restart the turn. (without Kang)

KingEitri.name: King Eitri
KingEitri.description: On Reveal: Give the next card you play +4 Power.

Kingpin.name: Kingpin
Kingpin.description: When a card moves here on turn 6, destroy it.

KittyPryde.name: Kitty Pryde
KittyPryde.description:
When this returns to your hand,
+1 Power. Returns at the start
of each turn.

Klaw.name: Klaw
Klaw.description: Ongoing: The location to the right has +6 Power.

Korg.name: Korg
Korg.description: On Reveal: Shuffle a Rock into your opponent's deck.

Kraven.name: Kraven
Kraven.description: When a card moves here, this gains +2 Power.

LadyDeathstrike.name: Lady Deathstrike
LadyDeathstrike.description: On Reveal: Destroy each card here with less Power than this.

LadySif.name: Lady Sif
LadySif.description: On Reveal: Discard the highest-cost card from your hand.

Leader.name: Leader
Leader.description: On Reveal: Copy the enemy card(s) with the highest Power played this turn, but on your side.

Leech.name: Leech
Leech.description:
At the start of turn 6, remove all abilities from cards in your
opponent's hand.

Legion.name: Legion
Legion.description: On Reveal: Replace each other location with this one.

LivingTribunal.name: The Living Tribunal
LivingTribunal.description: Ongoing: Split your total Power evenly among all locations.

Lizard.name: Lizard
Lizard.description: Ongoing: -4 Power if your opponent has 4 cards here.

Lockjaw.name: Lockjaw
Lockjaw.description: After you play a card here, swap it with a card in your deck. (once per turn)

Loki.name: Loki
Loki.description: On Reveal: Replace your hand with cards from your opponent's starting deck. Give them -1 cost.

LukeCage.name: Luke Cage
LukeCage.description: Ongoing: Your cards can't have their Power reduced.

Magik.name: Magik
Magik.description: On Reveal: Replace this location with 'Limbo'. Doesn't work after turn 5.

Magneto.name: Magneto
Magneto.description: On Reveal: Move all opposing 3 and 4-Cost cards to this location.

Makkari.name: Makkari
Makkari.description: When you draw this, place it at a random location.

Mantis.name: Mantis
Mantis.description: On Reveal: If your opponent played a card here this turn, draw a card from their deck.

MariaHill.name: Maria Hill
MariaHill.description: On Reveal: Add a random 1 or 2-Cost card to your hand.

MasterMold.name: Master Mold
MasterMold.description: On Reveal: Add 2 Sentinel to your opponent's hand.

MBaku.name: M'Baku
MBaku.description: If this is in your deck at the end of the game, it jumps to a random location.

Medusa.name: Medusa
Medusa.description: On Reveal: If this is at the middle location, +3 Power.

Mephisto.name: Mephisto
Mephisto.description: If you win this game, double your winnings.

MilesMorales.name: Miles Morales
MilesMorales.description: If a card moved last turn, this costs 1.

MindStone.name: Mind Stone
MindStone.description: On Reveal: Draw 2 Stones from your deck.

Mirage.name: Mirage
Mirage.description: On Reveal: Copy the lowest-Cost card in your opponent's hand into your hand. Give it +2 Power.

Mojo.name: Mojo
Mojo.description: Ongoing: If both players have 4 cards at this location, +6 Power.

MoonKnight.name: Moon Knight
MoonKnight.description: On Reveal: Discard a card from each player's hand.

Morbius.name: Morbius
Morbius.description: Ongoing: +2 Power for each time you discarded a card this game.

Morph.name: Morph
Morph.description: On Reveal: Become a copy of a random card in your opponent's hand.

MrNegative.name: Mister Negative
MrNegative.description: On Reveal: Swap the Power and Cost of all cards in your deck.

MrSinister.name: Mister Sinister
MrSinister.description: On Reveal: Add a Sinister Clone to this location with the same Power.

MsMarvel.name: Ms. Marvel
MsMarvel.description: Ongoing: If this is your only card here, adjacent locations have +5 Power.

MultipleMan.name: Multiple Man
MultipleMan.description: When this moves, add a copy to the old location.

Mysterio.name: Mysterio
Mysterio.description: As you play this, play Illusions to other locations. Disguise this as an Illusion until the game ends.

MysterioUnrevealed.description: Which is the real Mysterio? The real one has 4 Power.

Mystique.name: Mystique
Mystique.description: On Reveal: If the last card you played has an Ongoing, copy its text. (if it's in play)

Nakia.name: Nakia
Nakia.description: On Reveal: Give all cards in your hand +1 Power.

Namor.name: Namor
Namor.description: Ongoing: +5 Power if this is your only card here.

Nebula.name: Nebula
Nebula.description: Each turn your opponent doesn't play a card here, +2 Power. (except the turn you play this)

NegasonicTeenageWarhead.name: Negasonic Teenage Warhead

NickFury.name: Nick Fury
NickFury.description: On Reveal: Add 3 random 6-Cost cards to your hand.

NightNurse.name: Night Nurse

Nova.name: Nova
Nova.description: When this is destroyed, give your cards +1 Power.

Odin.name: Odin

Okoye.name: Okoye
Okoye.description: On Reveal: Give every card in your deck +1 Power.

OmegaRed.name: Omega Red
OmegaRed.description: Ongoing: If you're ahead by 10 Power here, +4 Power to other locations.

Onslaught.name: Onslaught
Onslaught.description: Ongoing: Double your other Ongoing effects at this location.

Orka.name: Orka
Orka.description: Ongoing: +5 Power if this is your only card here.

Patriot.name: Patriot
Patriot.description: Ongoing: Your cards with no abilities have +2 Power.

Polaris.name: Polaris
Polaris.description: On Reveal: Move an opposing 1 or 2-Cost card to this location.

PowerStone.name: Power Stone

ProfessorX.name: Professor X
ProfessorX.description: Ongoing: Lock down this location. (Cards can't be added, removed, etc.)

Psylocke.name: Psylocke
Psylocke.description: On Reveal: Next turn, you get +1 Energy.

Punisher.name: Punisher
Punisher.description: Ongoing: +1 Power for each opposing card at this location.

Quake.name: Quake
Quake.description: On Reveal: If this is at the middle location, swap the positions of each location.

Quinjet.name: Quinjet
Quinjet.description: Ongoing: Cards that didn't start in your deck cost 1 less. (minimum 1)

Random.name: Random

RealityStone.name: Reality Stone
RealityStone.description: On Reveal: Transform this location into a new one. Draw a card.

RedGuardian.name: Red Guardian
RedGuardian.description: On Reveal: You must play a card here next turn.

RedSkull.name: Red Skull
RedSkull.description: Ongoing: Enemy cards at this location have +2 Power.

Rescue.name: Rescue
Rescue.description: On Reveal: If you play a card here next turn, +5 Power.

Rhino.name: Rhino
Rhino.description: On Reveal: Ruin this location. (remove its ability)

RocketRaccoon.name: Rocket Raccoon
RocketRaccoon.description: On Reveal: If your opponent played a card here this turn, +2 Power.

Rockslide.name: Rockslide
Rockslide.description: On Reveal: Shuffle 2 Rocks into your opponent's deck.

Rogue.name: Rogue
Rogue.description: On Reveal: Steal an Ongoing ability from a random enemy card at this location.

RogueTutorial.name: Rogue
RogueTutorial.description: "Ah'm giving you one last chance to surrender, sugah."

Ronan.name: Ronan the Accuser
Ronan.description: Ongoing: +2 Power for each card in your opponent's hand.

Sabretooth.name: Sabretooth
Sabretooth.description: When this is destroyed, return it to your hand. It costs 0.

Sandman.name: Sandman
Sandman.description: Ongoing: Players can only play 1 card a turn.

Sauron.name: Sauron
Sauron.description: On Reveal: Remove the abilities from all Ongoing cards in your hand and deck.

ScarletWitch.name: Scarlet Witch
ScarletWitch.description: On Reveal: Replace this location with a random new one.

Scorpion.name: Scorpion
Scorpion.description: On Reveal: Afflict cards in your opponent's hand with -1 Power.

Sentinel.name: Sentinel

SentinelTutorial.name: Sentinel
SentinelTutorial.description: On Reveal: Add another Sentinel to your hand.

Sentry.name: Sentry
Sentry.description: You can't play this at the right location. On Reveal: Add a -10 Power Void to the right location.

Sera.name: Sera
Sera.description: Ongoing: Cards in your hand cost 1 less. (minimum 1)

ShadowKing.name: Shadow King
ShadowKing.description: On Reveal: Set all cards here to their original base Power.

ShangChi.name: Shang-Chi
ShangChi.description: On Reveal: Destroy all enemy cards at this location that have 9 or more Power.

Shanna.name: Shanna
Shanna.description: On Reveal: Add a random 1-Cost card to each location.

SheHulk.name: She-Hulk
SheHulk.description: Costs 1 less for each unspent Energy last turn.

Shuri.name: Shuri
Shuri.description: On Reveal: If you play your next card here, double its Power.

Silk.name: Silk
Silk.description: After ANY card is played here, this moves to another location.

SilverSable.name: Silver Sable
SilverSable.description: You can only play this at a location where you have 6+ total Power.

SilverSamurai.name: Silver Samurai
SilverSamurai.description: On Reveal: Each player discards the lowest-Power card from their hand.

SilverSurfer.name: Silver Surfer
SilverSurfer.description: On Reveal: Give your other 3-Cost cards +2 Power.

SinisterClone.name: Sinister Clone
SinisterClone.description: "Sinister is a system. Sinister is a species. Everything is Sinister."

Snowguard.name: Snowguard
Snowguard.description: While in your hand, this transforms each turn into a Hawk or a Bear.

SnowguardBear.name: Snowguard
SnowguardBear.description: On Reveal: Trigger the effect of this location.

SnowguardHawk.name: Snowguard
SnowguardHawk.description: On Reveal: Ignore all location abilities next turn.

SnowguardWolf.name: Snowguard
SnowguardWolf.description: Ongoing: -2 Power for each other card you have here.

SoulStone.name: Soul Stone
SoulStone.description: On Reveal: Draw a card. Ongoing: Enemy cards here have -1 Power.

SpaceStone.name: Space Stone
SpaceStone.description: On Reveal: Next turn, you can move one card to this location. Draw a card.

SpiderMan.name: Spider-Man
SpiderMan.description: On Reveal: Move to another location and pull an enemy card from here to there.

SpiderWoman.name: Spider-Woman
SpiderWoman.description: On Reveal: Afflict all enemy cards here with -1 Power.

SquirrelGirl.name: Squirrel Girl
SquirrelGirl.description: On Reveal: Add a 1-Power Squirrel to each other location.

Starlord.name: Star-Lord
Starlord.description: On Reveal: If your opponent played a card here this turn, +3 Power.

Storm.name: Storm
Storm.description: On Reveal: Flood this location. Next turn is the last turn cards can be played here.

StrongGuy.name: Strong Guy
StrongGuy.description: Ongoing: If your hand is empty, +6 Power.

Stryfe.name: Stryfe
Stryfe.description: If your opponent has 12+ Power here at the end of any turn, destroy this.

Sunspot.name: Sunspot
Sunspot.description: At the end of each turn, gain +1 Power for each unspent Energy.

SuperSkrull.name: Super-Skrull
SuperSkrull.description: Ongoing: Has the Ongoing effects of all enemy cards.

Surtur.name: Surtur

Swarm.name: Swarm

When this is discarded from your hand, add two copies that Cost 0
to your hand.

SwordMaster.name: Sword Master
SwordMaster.description: On Reveal: Discard a card from your hand.

Taskmaster.name: Taskmaster
Taskmaster.description: On Reveal: Set this cards Power equal to that of the last card you played. (if that card's in play)

Thanos.name: Thanos
Thanos.description: At the start of the game, shuffle the six Infinity Stones into your deck.

TheCollector.name: The Collector

ThePhoenixForce.name: Phoenix Force

Thor.name: Thor

TimeStone.name: Time Stone

Titania.name: Titania
Titania.description: After ANY card is played here, this card switches sides.

Toad.name: Toad
Toad.description: On Reveal: Move the last card you played to this location.

Uatu.name: Uatu the Watcher

Ultron.name: Ultron

UncleBen.name: Uncle Ben

Valkyrie.name: Valkyrie
Valkyrie.description: On Reveal: Set ALL cards at this location to 3 Power.

Venom.name: Venom

Viper.name: Viper

Vision.name: Vision

Viv.name: Viv Vision

When you move a card to a location, move this card
there as well.

Warpath.name: Warpath
Warpath.description: Ongoing: If any of your locations are empty, +4 Power.

Wasp.name: Wasp
Wasp.description: "My secret power is that I get things done."

Wave.name: Wave

WidowsBite.name: Widow's Bite

WhiteQueen.name: White Queen

WhiteTiger.name: White Tiger

WinterSoldier.name: Winter Soldier

Witchfire.name: Witchfire
Witchfire.description: On Reveal: Your opponent draws a card, increase its cost by 1.

Wolfsbane.name: Wolfsbane
Wolfsbane.description: On Reveal: +2 Power for each other card you have here.

Wolverine.name: Wolverine
Wolverine.description:
When this is discarded or destroyed, regenerate it at a random location
with +2 Power.

Wong.name: Wong
Wong.description: Ongoing: Your On Reveal abilities at this location happen twice.

X23.name: X-23
X23.description: When this is discarded or destroyed, regenerate it at a random location and you get +1 Energy next turn.

Yellowjacket.name: Yellowjacket
Yellowjacket.description: On Reveal: Afflict your other cards at this location with -1 Power.

Yondu.name: Yondu
Yondu.description: On Reveal: Destroy the top card of your opponent's deck.

YoYo.name: Yo-Yo
YoYo.description: When this card moves, move it back with +1 Power.

Zero.name: Zero
Zero.description: On Reveal: Remove the abilities on the next card you play.

Bast.name: Bast
Bast.description: On Reveal: Set the Power of all cards in your hand to 3.

Attuma.name: Attuma
Attuma.description: If you have another card here at the end of your turn, destroy this.

Knull.name: Knull
Knull.description: Ongoing: Has the combined Power of all cards destroyed this game.

Stature.name: Stature
Stature.description: Costs 1 if your opponent discarded a card from their hand this game.

Ghost.name: Ghost
Ghost.description: Ongoing: Your cards are always revealed last. (Their On Reveal abilities happen last.)

Nimrod.name: Nimrod
Nimrod.description: When this is destroyed, add a copy to each other location.

Stegron.name: Stegron
Stegron.description: On Reveal: Move an enemy card from here to another location.

HowardTheDuck.name: Howard the Duck
HowardTheDuck.description: Ongoing: Tap this to see the top card of your deck.

HighEvolutionary.name: High Evolutionary
HighEvolutionary.description: At the start of the game, unlock the potential of your cards with no abilities.

IronLad.name: Iron Lad
IronLad.description: On Reveal: Copy the text of your deck's top card.

SpiderHam.name: Spider-Ham
SpiderHam.description: On Reveal: Transform the highest-cost card in your opponent's hand into a Pig, keeping its Power and Cost.

SpiderMan2099.name: Spider-Man 2099
SpiderMan2099.description: The first time this moves to a location, destroy an enemy card there.

Echo.name: Echo
Echo.description: After your opponent plays an Ongoing card here, remove its abilities.

Daken.name: Daken
Daken.description: On Reveal: Add the Muramasa Shard to your hand.

MuramasaShard.name: Muramasa Shard
MuramasaShard.description: When this is discarded or destroyed, double Daken's Power.

RavonnaRenslayer.name: Ravonna Renslayer
RavonnaRenslayer.description: Ongoing: Your cards with 1 or less Power cost 1 less. (minimum 1)

MobiusMMobius.name: Mobius M. Mobius
MobiusMMobius.description: Ongoing: Your Costs can't be increased. Your opponent's Costs can't be reduced.

Alioth.name: Alioth
Alioth.description: On Reveal: Destroy ALL enemy cards played here this turn. (including unrevealed cards)

EbonyBlade.name: Ebony Blade
EbonyBlade.description: On Reveal: If your Black Knight is here, destroy the highest-Power enemy card(s) here.

EvolvedWasp.name: Wasp
EvolvedWasp.description: On Reveal: Afflict a random enemy card here with -1 Power.

EvolvedMistyKnight.name: Misty Knight
EvolvedMistyKnight.description: When you end a turn with unspent Energy, give another friendly card +1 Power.

EvolvedShocker.name: Shocker
EvolvedShocker.description: On Reveal: Give the leftmost card in your hand -1 Cost.

EvolvedCyclops.name: Cyclops
EvolvedCyclops.description: When you end a turn with unspent Energy, afflict 2 random enemies here with -1 Power.

EvolvedTheThing.name: The Thing
EvolvedTheThing.description: On Reveal: Afflict 3 random enemy cards here with -1 Power.

EvolvedAbomination.name: Abomination
EvolvedAbomination.description: Costs 1 less for each enemy card in play that's afflicted with negative Power.

EvolvedHulk.name: Hulk
EvolvedHulk.description: When you end a turn with unspent Energy, +2 Power. (if in hand or in play)
